title: Super Meat Boy Forever (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Get ready to grab Super Meat Boy Forever for the delightful price of absolutely nothing on the Epic Games Store! Meat Boy is back in action! And this time, he's on the run, literally! Dive, slide, punch, and jump your way through levels so brutal, that will make you look like a soft marshmallow.
instructions:
1. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
2. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: Dead by Daylight 50k Bloodpoints Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Dead by Daylight 50k Bloodpoints Key and elevate your gaming experience to new heights!
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.
platforms: PC, Steam, Epic Games Store, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Android, iOS

title: Paladins Golden Cache Chest Key Giveaway
description: Celebrate Year 7 of Paladins with free goodies by claiming your Paladins Golden Cache Chest! Each chest contains Rare and Epic Cosmetics and Flair. Please note the key must be redeemed in-game!
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

title: Divine Knockout Serious Business Hercules Skin Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Divine Knockout Skin Key and unlock the Serious Business Skin for Hercules! Please note the base game Divine Knockout (free-to-play) is required to enjoy this add-on content.
instructions:
1. Log in or register to your free Alienware Arena account.
2. Click the button to unlock your key and follow the giveaway instructions.
